Posts.Content: worried4sis wrote: My sister over two weeks had a mammogram, then an ultrasound and yesterday a contrast dye MRI due to two solid masses - one large, the other smaller - the radiologist said he doesn't see anything that makes him think she has cancer.  Does anyone have information on the conclusiveness of MRI's?  I thought I had heard about MRI's having false negatives, but being overwhelmed trying to find information maybe it is false positives.  Can we relax now with these results?  Thanks! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: MRI false negatives? worried4sis marie5890
